name: Ch18BBaseConvo2
_source: speak;Knoll;Excuse me...|You are Saleh of Caer Pelyn, are you not?
speak;Saleh;I am.|And you are Knoll, a shaman of Grado.
speak;Knoll;Yes...|I hope I'm not intruding.|There is much I've read about the mountain village of Caer Pelyn.
speak;Knoll;The ancient wisdom preserved there...|The connection to the Great Dragon...
speak;Saleh;What is it you wish to know?
speak;Knoll;I was hoping to learn more about the sacred histories kept in your village.|The texts in Grado's libraries mention Caer Pelyn as a place of great knowledge.
speak;Saleh;Our knowledge is not shared lightly.|Particularly with those who hail from Grado.
speak;Saleh;Your empire's recent actions have given us reason for caution.
speak;Knoll;I... understand your hesitation.|What happened in Grado was not the will of its people.
speak;Knoll;The emperor was not himself.|Something changed him...
speak;Saleh;So I have heard.|Yet caution remains wisdom in these dark times.
speak;Knoll;Of course.|I apologize for my presumption.
speak;Knoll;If I may ask just one question, though...|Does Caer Pelyn's lore speak of the Demon King?
speak;Saleh;Why do you ask about such things?
speak;Knoll;My research in Grado...|Before everything went wrong...|We found references to ancient powers.
speak;Knoll;Powers that Prince Lyon sought to harness.|I fear it may have been connected to the Demon King's influence.
speak;Saleh;The Demon King is more than legend.|That much I can tell you.
speak;Saleh;Our elders speak of a darkness that once engulfed all the land.|A darkness that sought to destroy all life.
speak;Knoll;Then the stories are true...|Do your records tell of how such power might be unsealed?|Of what signs would herald his return?
speak;Saleh;Ancient evil does not rest easily.|It seeks vessels through which to return.
speak;Saleh;Those who seek power above all else...|Those who would disturb what must remain sealed...
speak;Saleh;They become the very doorways through which darkness enters.
speak;Knoll;Lyon...|Is that what happened to you?
speak;Saleh;I do not have all the answers you seek.|The Great Dragon might know more, but such knowledge is not mine to share.
speak;Saleh;What I can tell you is this:|When light and darkness wage war, it is within the hearts of men that the true battle is fought.
speak;Knoll;I see...|Thank you for even this much, Saleh.|It is more than I had before.
speak;Saleh;Knowledge is a double-edged blade, Knoll of Grado.|Be careful what you seek, lest you cut yourself on its edge.
speak;Knoll;You speak wisely.|Perhaps when this war is over...|If we survive...|Maybe then Caer Pelyn might be more open to sharing its wisdom.
speak;Saleh;Perhaps.|The future remains unwritten.|For now, we must focus on the threats before us.
speak;Knoll;Indeed.|Thank you for your time, Saleh of Caer Pelyn.
speak;Saleh;May the Great Dragon guide your path, Knoll of Grado.
